ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_CAPTURE_RSN_CODE_PAIDIN

ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Capture reason code for loan order return

ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Capture reason code for voiding a transaction
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to capture the reason code for voiding a transaction

ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Capture reason code for price override

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_CAPTURE_RSN_CODE_PAIDOUT
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Capture reason code for paid out
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to capture the reason code for Paid Out

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_RTN_RSN_CODE
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Capture reason code for returning an item
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to capture the reason code for returns

ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Capture reason code for item discount
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to capture the reason code for item discount
